input.sentences: the feather had unique patterns on it . must have came from one of the exotic birds .
the branch had been here for hundreds of years . termites got the best of it now .
the plant was very wide and provided ample shade .
a blue bird lost its feather .
output.sentences: On a hike yesterday, I saw a feather with some unique patterns.
I also found a branch covered with hundreds of termites.
We stopped by a stream that flowed slowly through the woods.
The wide leaves of a tree provided shade as we ate lunch.
Unfortunately, I lost the cool blue feather I found.
